items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your weight evenly distributed between both feet.
Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Engage your core and keep your back straight as you hinge forward at the hips, extending your lifted leg behind you.
Lower your torso until it is parallel to the ground, keeping your lifted leg in line with your torso.
Pause for a moment, then use your glutes and hamstrings to lift your torso back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch legs and repeat on the other side.
